title: Is the World Infinite?
author: Philosopher Xeno
pages: As we journey across the land, one ponders: does this world have boundaries, or does it stretch endlessly, beyond our sight?
The horizon tantalizes our curiosity, yet we've never reached its end. It reflects our aspirations, eternally distant.
Our explorations teach us that the world is vast, full of secrets and wonders. Every new landscape holds a story.
We chart maps, mark paths, yet the mystery endures. In pursuit of infinity, we find purposeâ€”our drive to discover what lies beyond.
While our realm may seem endless, it is our imagination that truly knows no bounds. Each step taken broadens our horizon.
